dbQuery.query: select v.id, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY v.lpu,v.les,v.pipe,v.station) RWN, v.lpu, v.les, v.pipe, v.station, v.tech_num, v.serial_num, v.nom_diam_id, (select 'Требуется' from sutstpa.service_cond_viol viol where viol.valve_id=v.id and viol.type_cl='утечка во внешнюю среду' limit 1) leak_is, null date_leak_repair, case when (/*LEAK_DESCR SHUTTER_TIGHT_DESCR*/v.CONT_MEAS_5_IS=1 or v.CONT_MEAS_6_IS=1 or v.ADD_IS_4=0) then 'Требуется' else null end ground_flage_is, null /*дата устранения - см. выше*/ date_ground_flage_repair, (select min(e.date_plan) from sutstpa.service_epb e where e.valve_id=v.id limit 1) /*min v.DATE_EPB1_PLAN,v.DATE_EPB2_PLAN*/ DATE_EPB_PLAN, null /*Конец следующего календарного года, после планируемой даты проведения*/ date_end_year, case when (v.PLATE_IS=0 or v.INF_1_IS=1 or v.INF_2_IS=1 or v.INF_3_IS=1 or v.INF_4_IS=1 or v.INF_5_IS=1 or v.INF_6_IS=1 or v.CONT_MEAS_7_IS=1 or v.ADD_IS_2=0 or v.ADD_IS_3=0) then 'Требуется' else null end inf_is, null date_inf_repair, case when v.exec_doc_is=0 then 'Требуется' else null end exec_doc_is, null DATE_EXEC_PLAN, (select 'Требуется' from sutstpa.mismatch_exec_doc d where d.valve_id=v.id and v.exec_doc_is=1 limit 1) /*Привести техническую документацию*/ exec_doc_repair, null DATE_EXEC_CORR_PLAN, (select 'Требуется' from sutstpa.mismatch_infoteh d where d.valve_id=v.id and v.infoteh_is=1 limit 1) infoteh_is, null date_infoteh_repair, null executive_person from sutstpa.valve v where v.CONT_MEAS_5_IS=1 or v.CONT_MEAS_6_IS=1 or v.ADD_IS_4=0 or v.PLATE_IS=0 or v.INF_1_IS=1 or v.INF_2_IS=1 or v.INF_3_IS=1 or v.INF_4_IS=1 or v.INF_5_IS=1 or v.INF_6_IS=1 or v.CONT_MEAS_7_IS=1 or v.ADD_IS_2=0 or v.ADD_IS_3=0 order by RWN

select s.id, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY s.lpu,s.les,s.pipe,s.station) RWN, s.lpu, s.les, s.pipe, s.station, (select 'Требуется' from sutstpa.service_cond_viol viol,sutstpa.valve v where viol.valve_id=v.id and v.struct_id=s.id and viol.type_cl='утечка во внешнюю среду' limit 1) leak_is, (select 'Требуется' from sutstpa.valve v where v.struct_id=s.id and (v.CONT_MEAS_2_IS=1 or v.CONT_MEAS_3_IS=1 or v.CONT_MEAS_4_IS=1) limit 1) cont_meas_is, s.date_rso_plan date_to_repair, case when (s.SIGN_2_IS=1 or s.SIGN_3_IS=1 or s.SIGN_4_IS=1 or s.SIGN_5_IS=1 or s.SIGN_6_IS=1 or s.TERRITORY_1_IS=0 or s.TERRITORY_2_IS=0 or s.TERRITORY_3_IS=0 or s.TERRITORY_4_IS=0 or s.BARRIER_1_IS=1 or s.BARRIER_2_IS=1 or s.BARRIER_3_IS=1 or s.BARRIER_4_IS=1 or s.BARRIER_5_IS=1 or s.ORDER_2_IS=0 or s.ORDER_5_IS=0 or exists (select 1 from sutstpa.valve v where v.struct_id=s.id and (v.TECH_NUM_IS=0 or v.EXT_CORR_1_IS=0 or v.EXT_CORR_2_IS=0 or v.EXT_CORR_3_IS=0 or v.GROUND_1_IS=0 or v.GROUND_2_IS=0 or v.GROUND_3_IS=0 or v.GROUND_4_IS=0 or v.GROUND_5_IS=0 or v.COLOR_1_IS=1 or v.COLOR_2_IS=1 or v.COLOR_3_IS=1 or v.COLOR_4_IS=1 or v.COLOR_5_IS=1 or v.COLOR_6_IS=1 or v.ORDER_6_IS=0))) then 'Требуется' else null end include_is, case when s.SIGN_2_IS=1 or s.SIGN_3_IS=1 or s.SIGN_4_IS=1 or s.SIGN_5_IS=1 or s.SIGN_6_IS=1 or s.TERRITORY_1_IS=0 or s.TERRITORY_2_IS=0 or s.TERRITORY_3_IS=0 or s.TERRITORY_4_IS=0 or s.BARRIER_1_IS=1 or s.BARRIER_2_IS=1 or s.BARRIER_3_IS=1 or s.BARRIER_4_IS=1 or s.BARRIER_5_IS=1 or s.ORDER_2_IS=0 or s.ORDER_5_IS=0 or exists (select 1 from sutstpa.valve v where v.struct_id=s.id and (v.TECH_NUM_IS=0 or v.EXT_CORR_1_IS=0 or v.EXT_CORR_2_IS=0 or v.EXT_CORR_3_IS=0 or v.GROUND_1_IS=0 or v.GROUND_2_IS=0 or v.GROUND_3_IS=0 or v.GROUND_4_IS=0 or v.GROUND_5_IS=0 or v.COLOR_1_IS=1 or v.COLOR_2_IS=1 or v.COLOR_3_IS=1 or v.COLOR_4_IS=1 or v.COLOR_5_IS=1 or v.COLOR_6_IS=1 or v.ORDER_6_IS=0)) then 'Требуется' else null end repair_is, s.DATE_RSO_PLAN, case when s.ORDER_1_IS=0 or s.ORDER_3_IS=0 then 'Требуется' else null end order_is, null /*срок устранения крановый узел*/ date_to_order, (select 'Требуется' from sutstpa.mismatch_exec_doc d,sutstpa.valve v where d.valve_id=v.id and v.struct_id=s.id limit 1) /*восстановление испдокументации*/ exec_doc_reload_is, (select 'Требуется' from sutstpa.mismatch_exec_doc d,sutstpa.valve v where d.valve_id=v.id and v.struct_id=s.id limit 1) /*приведение в соотв испдокументации*/ exec_doc_corr_is, (select min(e.date_plan) from sutstpa.service_epb e,sutstpa.valve v where e.valve_id=v.id and v.struct_id=s.id limit 1) /*min v.DATE_EPB1_PLAN,v.DATE_EPB2_PLAN*/ DATE_EPB_PLAN, (select 'Требуется' from sutstpa.vent_pipe vp where vp.struct_id=s.id and (vp.HEIGHT_IS=0 or vp.COLOR_IS=1 or vp.ROOF_IS=1 or vp.PEDESTAL_IS=1 or vp.VERT_IS=1) limit 1) vent_pipe_is, s.DATE_RSO_PLAN date_vent_pipe, null /*ответственный*/ executive_person from sutstpa.structure s where s.SIGN_4_IS=1 or s.TERRITORY_4_IS=0 or s.ORDER_2_IS=0 or s.ORDER_5_IS=0 or s.ORDER_3_IS=0 or s.SIGN_5_IS=1 or s.TERRITORY_1_IS=0 or s.TERRITORY_3_IS=0 or s.TERRITORY_2_IS=0 or s.BARRIER_2_IS=1 or s.ORDER_1_IS=0 or s.BARRIER_1_IS=1 or s.BARRIER_4_IS=1 or s.BARRIER_3_IS=1 or s.BARRIER_5_IS=1 or s.ORDER_4_IS=0 or s.SIGN_3_IS=1 or s.SIGN_6_IS=1 or s.SIGN_2_IS=1 or exists (select 1 from sutstpa.vent_pipe vv where vv.struct_id=s.id and (vv.COLOR_IS=1 or vv.PEDESTAL_IS=1 or vv.VERT_IS=1 or vv.HEIGHT_IS=0 or vv.ROOF_IS=1)) or exists (select 1 from sutstpa.valve v where v.struct_id=s.id and (v.TECH_NUM_IS=0 or v.EXT_CORR_1_IS=0 or v.EXT_CORR_2_IS=0 or v.EXT_CORR_3_IS=0 or v.GROUND_1_IS=0 or v.GROUND_2_IS=0 or v.GROUND_3_IS=0 or v.GROUND_4_IS=0 or v.GROUND_5_IS=0 or v.COLOR_1_IS=1 or v.COLOR_2_IS=1 or v.COLOR_3_IS=1 or v.COLOR_4_IS=1 or v.COLOR_5_IS=1 or v.COLOR_6_IS=1 or v.ORDER_6_IS=0)) order by RWN
